channel.title: Minimal Blog
channel.description: Thoughts on design, development, and the beauty of simplicity.

item.title: Getting Started with Minimalist Blogging
item.description: Welcome to my minimalist blog. This post covers the philosophy behind clean, distraction-free writing and how to create meaningful content.

item.title: The Art of Simple Design
item.description: Exploring how constraints in design can lead to more creative and effective solutions. A deep dive into the principles that make minimalism work.

item.title: Building a Blog with Astro: Performance and Simplicity
item.description: Why I chose Astro for this blog and how it delivers exceptional performance while maintaining developer productivity and content management simplicity.
